name: MoterBike Transporter Simulator
description:
MoterBike Transporter Simulator

Get ready to transport bikes on your transport trucks with bike transport truck game and become a bike transport truck driver 3D.
In this MoterBike Transporter Simulator games you have to transport sports and heavy bikes to designated place.

Bike transport games were never been so amazing with different 25 levels. So forget other ordinary airplane moto transport games and try this newest addition in bike cargo or bike transport and become a bike transporter.

Start the adventure of one of the best bike transport games begin with twist of moto bike cargo games where you are required to park different heavy bikes and other sports motorbikes on cargo truck and clear all missions like a boss in bike cargo transport bike 3d game so play rite now and step into the world of Bike Transport Truck 3D!

Bike transporter truck you can ride your desired bike and can be drive your desire transport or truck with super hot bike transport games.   

Game Features :

=> The lovers of bike transport games with truck driver edition.
=> Two modes are there for kids and adult
=> Extreme motorbike driving simulation
=> Amazing 3D graphics
=> User friendly driving controls
